  • Changelog

    Function reference

    Authentication

    Validate Python environment and Google Earth Engine credentials

    initialise_harvester()
    Initialise and validate Data-Harvester, including dependencies
    validate_conda()
    Check if conda is available
    authenticate_ee()
    Authenticate to Google Earth Engine API

    Downloading and processing

    Functions to download and manipulate images from various APIs

    download_dea()
    Download from Digital Earth Australia
    download_dem()
    Download Geoscience Australia DEM grid data
    download_landscape()
    Download from SLGA Landscape Attributes
    download_radiometric()
    Download from Geosciences Australia's Radiometric Map of Australia
    download_silo()
    Download from SILO database
    download_slga()
    Download from SLGA (Soil Atributes)
    init_logtable()
    Create a dataframe to store raster download and processing information
    update_logtable()
    Update download and processing dataframe
    extract_values()
    Extract values from GeoTIFF image(s)

    Google Earth Engine

    Functions to download and manipulate images from GEE

    download_ee()
    Download an Earth Engine Image or Image Collection
    collect_ee()
    Define Google Earth Engine data to collect
    preprocess_ee()
    Preprocess an Earth Engine Image or Image Collection
    aggregate_ee()
    Aggregate an Earth Engine Image Collection by period
    map_ee()
    Visualise an Earth Engine Image or Image Collection on an interactive map
    harvest()
    A headless version of the Data-Harvester (with some limitations)

    Configuration

    Functions to programmatically edit the current YAML configuration file. Note this section will be deprecated in favour of a new system and is only available as reference

    config_bbox()
    Specify bounding box limits as a vector
    config_crs()
    Define coordinate reference system
    config_dates()
    Define download date and times, and summary interval
    config_dea()
    Configure DEA resource download settings
    config_dem()
    Configure DEM resource download settings
    config_paths()
    Configure paths to input and output folders and files
    config_res()
    Define resolution in arcsecs
    config_silo()
    Configure SILO resource download settings
    config_slga()
    Configure SLGA resource download settings
    config_xy_names()
    Specify the column names of x and y variables in data file
    create_yaml()
    Create a YAML configuration file for editing
    wrap_config()
    Wrap configuration file to data frame
    write_config()
    Write config to file
    load_config()
    Load a configuration file for data harvester
    load_settings()
    Load settings from YAML file

    S3 methods

    plot(<rasterPath>)
    Plot GeoTIFF object
    plot(<getdata_ee.download>)
    Plot Earth Engine object
    print(<harvester>)
    Print harvester objects

    Example data

    Llara
    Example data Llara
